casebody.data:
In the Matter of J.C. and J.C. No. 280A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 1, 2015. Richard Croutharmel, Raleigh, for Collins, Shannon. W.A. Holland, Jr., Jennifer S. O'Connor, Smithfield, for Johnston County DSS. Ryan Short, Raleigh, for Collins, Jeffrey. Tawanda Natasha Foster, for J.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of September 2014 by Petitioner:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of July 2015."
